Sentencas: Samarium praseodymium (Sm-Pr) co-doped ceria was synthesized by the co-precipitation technique as an electrolyte for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (LT-SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The structural, morphological, compositional, and electrical characterization of the synthesized samples were evaluated via x-ray diffraction (XRD), x-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), energy-dispersive x-ray spectroscopy (EDX) and impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The generation of a single-phase fluorite structure of co-doped ceria without any secondary phases has been verified by XRD analysis, exhibiting the successful incorporation of Sm and Pr ions into the ceria lattice.
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: Vegard's law is utilized for Pr redox behavior explaining the variation in lattice constant values.
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: SEM pictures show that the co-doped ceria powder has a homogeneous and welldispersed microstructure, and has enhanced particle size.
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The impedance spectroscopy results indicate that Sm-Pr co-doped ceria has much higher ionic conductivity than single-doped ceria.
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The highest amount of ionic conductivity (aionic) for the composition Ce0.80Sm0.10 Pr0.10O2_delta recorded as 2.12 x 10_ 2S/cm at 500 degrees C, and 6.19 x 10_
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: 2S/cm at 750 degrees C with the lowest activation energy Ea = 0.48 eV, which has been not reported earlier.
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: Sm and Pr are chosen as dopants because of their capacity to generate oxygen vacancies and improve ceria's ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: This study contributes to the enhancement in the ionic conductivity of co-doped ceria by coprecipitation technique and the temperature-dependent frequency exponent factor s is also explored to comprehend the conduction mechanism of the prepared samples.
Titulo: Structural and ionic conduction study of Sm-Pr co-doped ceria electrolyte materials for LT-SOFC applications
